item.title: 消息人士称，随着监管审查的加强，印度将传唤亚马逊和 Flipkart 高管
item.description: 一位高级政府消息人士称，印度金融犯罪机构将传唤 Flipkart 和亚马逊的高管，因为该机构在突袭了这两家电子商务公司的一些卖家几天后，加紧了对涉嫌违反外国投资法的调查。【原文：India's financial crime agency will summon Flipkart and Amazon executives as it steps up an investigation into alleged foreign investment law violations, days after raiding some of the e-commerce firms' sellers, a senior government source said.】

item.title: 大陆集团下调销售指引，第三季度利润超预期
item.description: 德国汽车和工业供应商大陆集团（Continental）周一今年第二次下调了销售指导，原因是欧洲和北美需求疲软，尽管该公司公布的第三季度核心利润高于预期。【原文：German automotive and industrial supplier Continental on Monday cut its sales guidance for the second time this year, blaming weak demand in Europe and North America, even as it posted third-quarter core profit above expectations.】

item.title: 新西兰央行异常漫长的夏休为利率提供了额外保险
item.description: 新西兰央行本月将面临更大的压力，要求其积极放宽政策，因为其利率会议日程表显示，距离下次会议还有三个月的空档期，时间异常之长。【原文：New Zealand's central bank will be under greater pressure to ease policy aggressively this month as its rate meeting calendar leaves an unusually long three-month gap until its next gathering, arguing for extra insurance against an economic slump.】

item.title: 印尼给予中小企业六个月的贷款豁免期
item.description: 根据一项新规定的细节，印尼为某些企业从国有银行获得全额贷款豁免开放了六个月的窗口期，直至2025年5月，该政策旨在促进贷款和经济增长。【原文：Indonesia has opened a six-month window until May 2025 for certain businesses to receive full loan forgiveness from state banks, a policy that aims to boost loan and economic growth, according to details of a new regulation.】

item.title: 早间竞价市场对中国政府的失望情绪似曾相识
item.description: 韦恩-科尔对欧洲和全球市场未来一天的展望。【原文：A look at the day ahead in European and global markets from Wayne Cole.】

item.title: 软银预计将通过首次公开募股获利 18.7 亿美元
item.description: 日本技术投资商软银集团（SoftBank Group）预计将于周二公布 2,870 亿日元（18.7 亿美元）的季度利润，这主要得益于投资组合公司的成功上市，尽管日元走强抑制了以外币计价的收益。【原文：Japanese technology investor SoftBank Group is expected to report a 287 billion yen ($1.87 billion) quarterly profit on Tuesday, boosted by successful portfolio company listings even as a stronger yen dampened foreign currency-denominated gains.】

item.title: 网络峰会在里斯本拉开帷幕，科技领袖权衡特朗普的回归
item.description: 里斯本本周将举办欧洲最大的年度科技会议--网络峰会，行业领袖和立法者将在会上权衡唐纳德-特朗普重返白宫的利弊。【原文：Lisbon will this week play host to Europe’s biggest annual tech conference, Web Summit, where industry leaders and lawmakers will weigh the pros and cons of Donald Trump’s return to the White House.】

item.title: 德国服务业面临困境，但增长潜力尚待挖掘
item.description: 德国的政策制定者将主要精力集中在挽救其工业冠军上，这可能忽视了该国服务业尚未开发的增长潜力。【原文：By chiefly focusing on trying to salvage its industry champions, German policymakers may have overlooked the untapped growth potential of the country's services sector.】

item.title: 美元在美国通胀数据和美联储发言人讲话前受到支撑
item.description: 美元周一走高，因为市场正在为美国通胀数据和美联储本周的一系列讲话做准备，而人民币则因中国政府最新的刺激计划不尽如人意而宿醉未醒。【原文：The dollar edged higher on Monday as markets braced for U.S. inflation data and a throng of Federal Reserve speakers this week, while the yuan nursed a hangover from Beijing's latest underwhelming stimulus package.】

item.title: 独家报道：亚行在美国和日本提供全球首个主权担保后增加气候融资
item.description: 亚洲开发银行的一位高管表示，在美国和日本同意为一些现有贷款承担风险之后，亚洲开发银行将把与气候相关的贷款最多增加 72 亿美元，这标志着有史以来第一次为气候融资提供主权担保。【原文：The Asian Development Bank will increase its climate-related lending by up to $7.2 billion after the United States and Japan agreed to underwrite risk for some existing loans, an ADB executive said, marking the first ever sovereign guarantees for climate finance.】

item.title: 雪佛龙开始在墨西哥湾平台重新部署人员
item.description: 雪佛龙公司周日表示，因飓风拉斐尔而关闭的墨西哥湾平台已开始重新部署人员并恢复生产。【原文：Chevron Corp has started redeploying personnel and restoring production at its Gulf Of Mexico platforms that were closed for Hurricane Rafael, the company said on Sunday.】

item.title: 中国刺激政策令人失望，亚洲股市下滑；比特币延续创纪录涨势
item.description: 周一，在中国政府的最新刺激政策未能达到投资者预期之后，香港股市领跌亚洲股市，这给华尔街上周五创下的历史新高蒙上了阴影，而期货市场则指出，股市在重新开盘时将进一步走强。【原文：Hong Kong stocks led declines in Asia on Monday after Beijing's latest stimulus fell short of investor expectations, overshadowing Wall Street's record highs from Friday and futures pointing to further strength at the reopen.】

item.title: 越南称特穆和谢因必须向政府登记，否则将被禁止入境
item.description: 越南政府表示，如果中国在线零售商 Shein 和 Temu 没有在 11 月底之前向越南贸易部登记其业务，越南政府将封锁这两家公司在越南的互联网域名和应用程序。【原文：The Vietnamese government said it will block the internet domains and apps of Chinese online retailers Shein and Temu in the country if they have not registered their operations with the trade ministry before the end of November.】

item.title: 比特币因特朗普押注而飙升至历史新高
item.description: 唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国总统大选中获胜以及支持加密货币的候选人被选入国会，刺激了人们对宽松监管环境的期待，比特币周一飙升至超过 81,000 美元的历史新高。【原文：Bitcoin soared to record high of over $81,000 on Monday as Donald Trump's victory in the U.S. presidential election along with pro-crypto candidates being voted to the Congress spurred expectations of a light-handed regulatory environment.】

item.title: 美国风暴威胁缓解，中国刺激政策令人失望，石油价格下跌
item.description: 油价周一延续跌势，原因是美国暴风雨造成的供应中断威胁有所缓解，而且中国的经济刺激计划令寻求推动世界第二大石油消费国需求增长的投资者感到失望。【原文：Oil prices extended declines on Monday as the threat of a supply disruption from a U.S. storm eased and after China's stimulus plan disappointed investors seeking fuel demand growth in the world's No. 2 oil consumer.】

item.title: 日本央行对加息时间意见不一，10 月总结显示
item.description: 周一，一份10月份政策会议的意见摘要显示，日本央行决策者在多快可以加息的问题上意见不一，一些决策者警告说市场有再次波动的风险。【原文：Bank of Japan policymakers were divided on how soon they could raise interest rates with some warning of the risk of renewed market volatility, a summary of opinions at the October policy meeting showed on Monday.】

item.title: 美元为美国通胀数据和多位美联储发言人做准备
item.description: 本周一，美元走势谨慎，因为市场正在为美国通胀数据和美联储本周的一系列讲话做准备，而人民币则因中国政府最新的经济刺激计划不尽如人意而耿耿于怀。【原文：The dollar started in a cautious mood on Monday as markets braced for U.S. inflation data and a throng of Federal Reserve speakers this week, while the yuan nursed a hangover from Beijing's latest underwhelming stimulus package.】

item.title: 澳大利亚 Novonix 公司达成向 Stellantis 公司供应合成石墨的协议
item.description: 澳大利亚电池制造商 Novonix 周一表示，该公司已与汽车制造商 Stellantis 签署了一份具有约束力的承购协议，向其北美地区的电池生产合作伙伴供应高性能合成石墨材料。【原文：Australian battery maker Novonix said on Monday it had signed a binding off-take agreement with automaker Stellantis to supply high-performance synthetic graphite material to its cell manufacturing partners in North America.】

item.title: 关于中国 1.4 万亿美元债务方案，您需要了解什么？
item.description: 中国周五公布了一项10万亿元（1.4万亿美元）的一揽子债务计划，以缓解地方政府的融资压力并稳定疲软的经济增长，但官员们没有宣布直接的经济刺激措施。【原文：China unveiled a 10 trillion yuan ($1.4 trillion) debt package on Friday to ease local government financing strains and stabilise flagging economic growth, but officials refrained from announcing direct economic stimulus.】

item.title: 早间竞标中国的谨慎令美国的乐观情绪降温
item.description: 亚洲市场前瞻【原文：A look at the day ahead in Asian markets.】

item.title: 欧洲央行霍尔茨曼告诉本报记者，目前没有理由不在 12 月降息
item.description: 欧洲央行决策者罗伯特-霍尔兹曼（Robert Holzmann）在周日发表的讲话中表示，从目前的情况来看，欧洲央行没有理由不在 12 月份降息，但降息决定将基于届时掌握的数据。【原文：As things currently stand, there is no reason for the European Central Bank not to cut interest rates in December but the decision will be based on the data available then, ECB policymaker Robert Holzmann said in remarks published on Sunday.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利称美国大范围遣返可能会扰乱一些企业的劳动力市场
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联储主席尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）周日表示，大范围驱逐外国出生的美国工人可能会扰乱一些企业，但对通胀和整体经济的影响将取决于具体细节。【原文：Widespread deportation of foreign-born workers from the United States probably would disrupt some businesses, but the impact on inflation and the broad economy would depend on the details, Minneapolis Federal Reserve President Neel Kashkari said on Sunday.】

item.title: 比特币首次升至 8 万美元以上
item.description: 本周早些时候，唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）在美国总统大选中取得决定性胜利后，比特币在周日的交易中接近创纪录的 80,000 美元。【原文：Bitcoin was trading near record $80,000 on Sunday after hitting it earlier in the session, following Donald Trump's decisive victory in the U.S. presidential election earlier in the week.】

item.title: 独家报道美国命令台积电停止向中国运送人工智能应用芯片
item.description: 在台积电通知美国商务部在华为人工智能处理器中发现芯片后，美国下达了这一命令。【原文：The U.S. order comes after TSMC notified the Commerce Department that a chip had been found in a Huawei AI processor.】

item.title: 瑞典选择巴西航空工业公司的 C-390 作为新的军用货运飞机
item.description: 巴西飞机制造商巴西航空工业公司（Embraer）周六表示，瑞典已选择该公司的 C-390 千禧型飞机作为该国新的军用货运飞机。【原文：Sweden has selected Embraer's C-390 Millennium as the country's new military cargo aircraft, the Brazilian planemaker said on Saturday.】

item.title: UMG 称潘兴无权要求阿姆斯特丹退市
item.description: 唱片公司环球音乐集团周六表示，亿万富翁比尔-阿克曼（Bill Ackman）的潘兴广场公司（Pershing Square）无权要求 UMG 成为一家在美国注册的公司或从阿姆斯特丹泛欧交易所退市。【原文：Record label Universal Music Group said on Saturday that billionaire Bill Ackman's Pershing Square does not have any right to require UMG to become a U.S.-domiciled company or delist from Euronext Amsterdam.】

item.title: 日本央行希望保持 2% 的通胀目标，同时监控气候冲击风险
item.description: 日本央行（BOJ）行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）上周六表示，即使气候变化对未来的物价发展造成长期冲击，日本央行仍希望维持2%的通胀目标。【原文：The Bank of Japan (BOJ) hopes to maintain its 2% inflation target even if climate change causes long-term shocks to future price developments, Governor Kazuo Ueda said on Saturday.】

item.title: 美联储卡什卡利：两党都希望降低通胀 - Fox News
item.description: 明尼阿波利斯联储主席尼尔-卡什卡利（Neel Kashkari）表示，他并不担心美联储与当选总统唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）之间可能发生冲突，因为美国两大政党都希望降低通胀。【原文：Minneapolis Federal Reserve President Neel Kashkari said he was not concerned about a potential clash between the Fed and President-elect Donald Trump because both major U.S. political parties want inflation lower.】

item.title: 独家报道消息人士称，丰田将加大在华生产力度，实现战略转型
item.description: 三位人士表示，丰田的目标是到 2030 年每年在中国生产至少 250 万辆汽车，这一改革将使丰田在中国的销售和生产业务更加紧密，并让当地高管更自由地参与开发、【原文：Toyota aims to make at least 2.5 million vehicles a year in China by 2030, three people said, an overhaul that will see it bring its Chinese sales and production operations closer together and allow local executives a freer hand in development,】

item.title: 尽管采取了刺激措施，中国居民消费价格涨幅仍为四个月来最慢
item.description: 周六的数据显示，尽管中国政府加倍实施刺激政策以支持萎靡不振的经济，但中国10月份的消费价格仍以四个月来最慢的速度上涨，同时生产者价格通货紧缩加深。【原文：China's consumer prices rose at the slowest pace in four months in October while producer price deflation deepened, data showed on Saturday, even as Beijing doubled down on stimulus to support the sputtering economy.】
